animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 💧 I use my nose to spray water

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I'm a good friend to humans. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones
🏡 I can be trained to sit and stay

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?
I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am a cat, but a very big one

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?
I slither on the ground and hiss. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I can live in the grass

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?
I have a pouch and hop around in Australia. What am I?

hints.text: 👶 I carry my young in my pouch

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I'm made of light and can be very loud. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am often followed by thunder.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am not the sky itself.

weather.question: I fall from the sky when it's cold, and I'm made of frozen water. I melt when it gets warm. What am I?

hints.text: ⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
💦 I turn into water when I melt.

weather.question: I make the trees dance, and the flags wave. I can be gentle or strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 You can feel me on your face.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I shine during the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You can get a tan from me.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I am water that falls from the sky. I help plants grow and fill up rivers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ You need an umbrella when I'm falling.

weather.question: I appear after a rainstorm when the sun shines through the raindrops. I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am an arc in the sky.
🍀 Some people think there is gold at my end.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am a very strong storm with a spinning cloud that can cause a lot of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I can lift things off the ground.
🏠 You should take shelter when I appear.

weather.question: I am tiny balls of ice that fall from the sky, often during a thunderstorm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can be as small as a pea, or as big as a golf ball.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I come from a storm, but I'm not rain or snow.

weather.question: I am a long period of very little rain, causing the land to dry up. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 The ground can crack because of me.
🌵 Plants and animals struggle to survive during me.
